)

    passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(50),
    passenger_email VARCHAR(50),
    passenger_phone VARCHAR(20),
    passenger_address VARCHAR(100)
)

    reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_id INT,
    transport_mode VARCHAR(50),
    transport_id INT,
    reservation_date TIMESTAMP
)

    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservation_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    payment_date TIMESTAMP
)

SELECT passenger_name, payment_amount FROM passengers JOIN reservations ON passengers.passenger_id = reservations.passenger_id JOIN payment_details ON reservations.reservation_id = payment_details.reservation_id;
